overview:
Philip Camilleri is co-founder and technical director at PickAndGive.org, a technology non-profit startup based in New York City.

After having worked for over a decade in Mobile Technology and Financial Trading Systems, Philip decided it was time to take the big step forward and start something completely new. With this in mind, he co-founded PickAndGive.org together with Bert Wyman, fulfilling a long-time dream of combining his passion for technology with his social convictions.
